site_url.description: The URL of the page on the site that is being reported.

search_type.description: The type of search query that led to the page being shown.

date.description: The date for which the data is being reported.

country.description: The country from which the search traffic originated.

device.description: The type of device used by the searcher (e.g., desktop, mobile).

clicks.description: The total number of clicks received by the page from search results.

impressions.description: The total number of times the page appeared in search results.

ctr.description: The click-through rate, i.e., the percentage of total impressions that resulted in clicks.

position.description: The average position at which the page appeared in search results.
